<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/environment/{environment}/flows/{flowId}/flowruns/{flowRunId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a [FlowRun](https://docs.ganymede.bio/app/flows/FlowView#running-flows) in an Environment by its id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"environment","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"flowId","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"flowRunId","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"FlowRun","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"flowId":{"type":"string"},"version":{"type":"string"},"environmentVersion":{"type":"string"},"libVersion":{"type":"string"},"initiator":{"type":"string"},"state":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","enum":["Queued","Running","Success","Failed","unknown"],"title":"FlowRunState"}]},"startTime":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"endTime":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"inputFiles":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"inputStrings":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"outputFiles":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"outputTables":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"triggeredFlows":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["id","flowId","version","environmentVersion","initiator","state"],"title":"FlowRun"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
